channel.title: 3 Of My WIP Songs - Mr Mooo
channel.description:
Thanks for the idea @akabillposters [quote="akabillposters, post:16, topic:7775, full:true"] Why not stick them up on SC as Private, stick ‘(Draft)’ in the name and then share them in the WIP category?
The feedback might help you hone in on what’s not quite right, if anything, and break the inner stalemate. [/quote]
Anyway, here are the 3 links to the songs which are upload-worthy but I feel I need some feedback first before I upload.
Claustrophobia - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/claustrophobia/s-qbhBV Sing For You - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/sing-for-you/s-b2XZ9 Sonder Dreams - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/sonder-dreams/s-i91wb
Feedback is, as always, appreciated. Enjoy!
-Mr Mooo

item.title: 3 Of My WIP Songs - Mr Mooo
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
Thanks for the idea @akabillposters

A VERY Bad Case Of The Perfectionisms

Why not stick them up on SC as Private, stick ‘(Draft)’ in the name and then share them in the WIP category?

The feedback might help you hone in on what’s not quite right, if anything, and break the inner stalemate.

Anyway, here are the 3 links to the songs which are upload-worthy but I feel I need some feedback first before I upload.

Claustrophobia - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/claustrophobia/s-qbhBV
Sing For You - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/sing-for-you/s-b2XZ9
Sonder Dreams - https://soundcloud.com/user-460338301/sonder-dreams/s-i91wb

Feedback is, as always, appreciated.
Enjoy!

-Mr Mooo

Read full topic
